verses.name: Leviticus 13:40
verses.text: And the man whose hair is fallen off his head, he is bald; yet is he clean.

verses.name: Leviticus 13:41
verses.text: And he that hath his hair fallen off from the part of his head toward his face, he is forehead bald: yet is he clean.

verses.name: Leviticus 13:42
verses.text: And if there be in the bald head, or bald forehead, a white reddish sore; it is a leprosy sprung up in his bald head, or his bald forehead.
